interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Haunted Castle
Review Date: 2013/05/09
Store: Jasper Steverlinck  (Actor),     Kyoko Baertsoen  (Actor),     Ben Stassen  (Director, Editor, Producer, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Science Fiction, Animation
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'A young musician is summoned to his mother', 'Amazon.com', 'Without question, 3-D technology has come a long way since the days of red and green cardboard glasses, and', 'Haunted Castle', 'offers delectable proof. This half-hour digitally animated feature--also available in', 'The Ultimate 3-D Collection', ', which includes two other films and the H3D "i-glasses" hardware needed to generate the 3-D imaging--tells the story of a young rock star facing the Faustian offer to sell his soul for fame and fortune.', 'The tale is a foil for the effects, of course, but a decent foil with above-par music and excellent animation and effects, from torches to trees, gargoyles to guitars. The sound is terrific, enhancing the sense of depth with a seamless DTS surround-sound mix that works well even in headphones.', '--Michael Mikesell', 'From the Back Cover', "A young musician is summoned to his mother's castle in accordance with her final wishes. Upon his arrival, Johnny quickly discovers that things are not as they appear. The castle begins to come alive as materializing spirits lead him to Mephisto (voiced by Harry Shearer), the ghoulish henchman to Mr. D (also Harry Shearer), who makes Johnny a tantalizing offer. The same offer that his mother accepted over twenty years earlier: surrender your soul in exchange for fame and fortune.", 'Experience a whirling visual thrill ride as Johnny explores the underworld of the castle to the explosive climax where Johnny confronts Mr. D and fights to free his mother/s spirit.', 'See more']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '17078926323', 'Director': 'Ben Stassen', 'Media Format': 'Color, Animated, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC, Live, Dolby, 3D', 'Run time': '38 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 16, 2001', 'Actors': 'Jasper Steverlinck, Kyoko Baertsoen, Harry Shearer', 'Producers': 'Ben Stassen, Caroline Van Iseghem, Charlotte Huggins', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Sling Shot', 'Writers': 'Ben Stassen, Kurt Frey', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I could not play it on my 3D player because it is not blu ray.  Was a little disapointed but got over it.
Review Title: Love this movie except ...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Haunted Castle
Jasper Steverlinck  (Actor),     Kyoko Baertsoen  (Actor),     Ben Stassen  (Director, Editor, Producer, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Science Fiction, Animation
['Product Description', 'A young musician is summoned to his mother', 'Amazon.com', 'Without question, 3-D technology has come a long way since the days of red and green cardboard glasses, and', 'Haunted Castle', 'offers delectable proof. This half-hour digitally animated feature--also available in', 'The Ultimate 3-D Collection', ', which includes two other films and the H3D "i-glasses" hardware needed to generate the 3-D imaging--tells the story of a young rock star facing the Faustian offer to sell his soul for fame and fortune.', 'The tale is a foil for the effects, of course, but a decent foil with above-par music and excellent animation and effects, from torches to trees, gargoyles to guitars. The sound is terrific, enhancing the sense of depth with a seamless DTS surround-sound mix that works well even in headphones.', '--Michael Mikesell', 'From the Back Cover', "A young musician is summoned to his mother's castle in accordance with her final wishes. Upon his arrival, Johnny quickly discovers that things are not as they appear. The castle begins to come alive as materializing spirits lead him to Mephisto (voiced by Harry Shearer), the ghoulish henchman to Mr. D (also Harry Shearer), who makes Johnny a tantalizing offer. The same offer that his mother accepted over twenty years earlier: surrender your soul in exchange for fame and fortune.", 'Experience a whirling visual thrill ride as Johnny explores the underworld of the castle to the explosive climax where Johnny confronts Mr. D and fights to free his mother/s spirit.', 'See more']

Love this movie except ...
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: Strong preference for animated films, particularly within the science fiction and fantasy genres, highlighting an appreciation for both visual effects and engaging narratives.
- **Formats**: Enjoys DVD formats, but has shown interest in 3D technology; however, there’s a noted disappointment when unable to play non-Blu-ray content on a 3D player, indicating a desire for high-quality viewing experiences.
- **Narrative Themes**: Favors stories that explore themes of fame, fortune, and supernatural elements, as evidenced by the drawn interest in Faustian bargains and character journeys involving personal sacrifice.
- **Entertainment Rating**: A tendency to rate films positively (5.0 rating given) when satisfied with the content, but can be critical regarding format compatibility, hinting at a discerning taste in viewing methods.
- **User Behavior**: Engages with products by reviewing them, indicating a willingness to share experiences and influence others' perceptions. 

Overall, the user values immersive experiences in animated storytelling and shows selective preferences regarding product formats.
